sentence.Network_en: They were decked out in tracksuits, seemingly to dissimulate their true function.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们都穿着田径服，似乎想掩饰他们的真实职能。

sentence.Network_en: This man was too injured to dissimulate well.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个人受伤严重，无法完全遮掩住。

sentence.Network_en: He who knows not how to dissimulate, can not reign.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知道如何装扮成一个君子的人无法赢得尊重.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... dissidence 异议,不一致 dissimulate 掩饰,假装 dissipate 使消散,驱散.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... dissidence 异议,不一致 dissimulate 掩饰,假装 dissipate 使消散,驱散.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... dissident 唱反调者 dissimulate 隐藏，掩饰 dissipate (使)驱散；浪费.

list.abs: he is a superb teller of a tale , a reveller in dodgy deeds , a keen observer of the febrile , dissimulating characters of court and embassy , and a splendid limner of the great jousts and entertainments of the age .他是个一流的故事讲解员；是个放纵于危险事迹的人，是个敏锐的观察者，观察宫廷和使

抱怨 grouch grouse grumble隐藏掩饰 dissemble dissimulate下 precipitate 沉淀使陷入促进猛降突如其来急促.
They were just dissimulating , pretending to be friendly ., 他们只不过是掩饰感情 , 假装友好.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin dissimulat- 'hidden, concealed', from the verb dissimulare

entry.def: When people dissimulate, they hide their true feelings, intentions, or nature.

example.ex: This man was too injured to dissimulate well...
example.tran: 这个人受伤严重，无法完全遮掩住。

example.ex: They were decked out in tracksuits, seemingly to dissimulate their true function.
example.tran: 他们都穿着田径服，似乎想掩饰他们的真实职能。

auth_sentence.content: Most people conceal a good deal of what they feel; Edith did not dissimulate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most people conceal a good deal of what they feel; Edith did not dissimulate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most people conceal a good deal of what they feel; Edith did not dissimulate.

auth_sentence.content: The skittish Diana could not dissimulate her exasperation with married life; but neither could the duteous Charles.
auth_sentence.res_content: The skittish Diana could not dissimulate her exasperation with married life; but neither could the duteous Charles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The skittish Diana could not dissimulate her exasperation with married life; but neither could the duteous Charles.
